name: modern_horizons
description: Huge mechanics-heavy package inspired by Modern Horizons (MH1, MH2, MH3): cascade, storm, delirium, affinity, modular, living weapon, dash, suspend, ninjutsu, madness, unearth, persist/undying, investigate, domain, proliferate, energy, Eldrazi, snow hooks and more.

Instant: Exile target tapped creature.
Creatures you control get +{X}/+{X} until end of turn.
Create {X} 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
You gain {X} life.
Put a +1/+1 counter on up to {X} target creatures.
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
Domain — Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each basic land type among lands you control.
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Until end of turn, target creature gains hexproof.
Until end of turn, target creature gains indestructible.
Exile target nonland permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Choose one — • Create a 1/1 [TOKEN_COLOR] [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature token. • Target creature gets +{X}/+{X} until end of turn.
Replicate {X} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.)
Buyback {X}
Surveil {X}.
Choose target spell. Its controller may pay {X}. If they don't, counter that spell.
Create {X} tapped Powerstone tokens.
Convoke
Overload {X}{X} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each".)
Sorcery: Exile target tapped creature.
Creatures you control get +{X}/+{X} until end of turn.
Create {X} 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
You gain {X} life.
Put a +1/+1 counter on up to {X} target creatures.
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
Domain — Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each basic land type among lands you control.
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Create {X} 1/1 [TOKEN_COLOR] [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature tokens.
Proliferate {X} times.
Cascade
Suspend {X}—{X}
Search your library for a card with mana value {X} or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
Return up to {X} target cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Resuspend — Exile target spell or permanent, then its owner suspends it with {X} time counters on it.
Create {X} tapped Treasure tokens, then you may sacrifice any number of artifacts. For each sacrificed this way, Scry {X}.

Living lore — Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Create an X/X blue Avatar creature token where X is its mana value. When it dies, you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost.
Domain — Choose up to one effect for each basic land type among lands you control. Return target creature card with mana value {X} or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
Creature: ETB — Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
ETB — Exile target creature an opponent controls with power {X} or less until this creature leaves the battlefield.
Enchantment: At the beginning of your upkeep, Proliferate {X} times.
Delirium — At the beginning of your end step, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, Create {X} Food tokens.
Whenever you cast a spell with cascade, Tap up to {X} target permanents.
Whenever one or more artifacts enter the battlefield under your control, Create a 1/1 [TOKEN_COLOR] [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature token.
Whenever you create a token, Target creature gets +{X}/+{X} until end of turn.
Artifact: Affinity for artifacts
Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 black Germ creature token, then attach this to it.)
Modular {X}
Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell.)
{T}, Sacrifice this: Draw a card.
{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {X} mana of any one color.
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, Create a 1/1 [TOKEN_COLOR] [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature token.
Equipment: Equipped creature has first strike and trample.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature has vigilance and lifelink.
AuraLand: Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
When enchanted land becomes tapped, create a 1/1 [TOKEN_COLOR] [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature token.
Enchant snow land; Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {X}. Spend this mana only to cast snow spells or activate abilities of snow permanents."
